required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Patients With Acute Renal Failure During Severe COVID-19
clinical_study.official_title: Renal Assessment of Patients With Acute Renal Failure During Severe COVID-19

brief_summary.textblock:
The occurrence of renal failure during severe forms of COVID-19 is common (20-35% of patients treated in intensive care) and associated with an unfavorable short-term prognosis, but the medium-term renal outcome is not is not known.
The aim of the study is to establish the frequency of chronic kidney failure after AKI KDIGO 2 and 3 occurring during severe COVID-19 in intensive care.

primary_outcome.measure: Retrospective study of renal development in patients with acute renal failure during severe COVID-19
primary_outcome.time_frame: Files analysed retrospectively from February 01, 2020 to July 31, 2020 will be examined]

study_pop.textblock: - Major subject hospitalized in an intensive care unit, Strasbourg, Nancy or Reims Hospitals, for severe COVID-19 between February 1, 2020 and July 31, 2020.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
- Major subject (≥18 years old)
- Subject hospitalized in an intensive care unit, Strasbourg, Nancy or Reims hospitals, for severe COVID-19 between February 1, 2020 and July 31, 2020.
- Having presented acute renal failure KDIGO 2 (assessed on a doubling of serum creatinine compared to the patient's reference values) or 3 (serum creatinine greater than 3 times the patient's reference, or anuria, or any recourse to extra-purification renal)
- Having left hospital alive after initial treatment for COVID-19
- Subject not having expressed his opposition, after information, to the reuse of his data for the purposes of this research.
Exclusion criteria:
- Subject having expressed opposition to participating in the study
- Subject under guardianship or guardianship
- Subject under safeguard of justice

overall_official.affiliation: Service de Néphrologie et Transplantation - Hôpitaux Universitaires de Strasbourg

facility.name: Service de Néphrologie et Transplantation - Hôpitaux Universitaires de Strasbourg
